actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend title II of the Social Security Act to increase to $332 the maximum amount of the lump-sum death benefit.
short_title: Social Security Death Benefit Increase Act of 2010

summary.text: Social Security Death Benefit Increase Act of 2010 - Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) (OASDI) of the Social Security Act to increase the maximum lump-sum death payment from $255 to $332.

titles.title: Social Security Death Benefit Increase Act of 2010
To amend title II of the Social Security Act to increase to $332 the maximum amount of the lump-sum death benefit.
